1.name: CHIA SEED Hydro Toner
1.description:
Formulated with Chia Seed and Pink Vitamin (Vitamin B12) for intense, upgraded hydrating care compared to original Chia Seed line
This is a revamped hydrating Chia Seed Toner with added pink vitamin (B12) that efficiently removes unnecessary skin residues and delivers instant hydration to exhausted and damaged skin with moisture-rich chia seeds that draw in moisture like a magnet.
*Dermatologically tested*

2.name: CHIA SEED Hydro Lotion
2.description:
Formulated with Chia Seed and Pink Vitamin (Vitamin B12) for intense, upgraded hydrating care compared to original Chia Seed line
This is a revamped hydrating Chia Seed Lotion with added pink vitamin (B12) for a moisture-rich complexion that efficiently delivers instant nourishment to exhausted and damaged skin.
*Dermatologically tested*

3.name: CHIA SEED Hydro Cream
3.description:
Formulated with Chia Seed and Pink Vitamin (Vitamin B12) for intense, upgraded hydrating care compared to original Chia Seed line
This is a revamped Chia Seed Cream with added Vitamin B12 that delivers instant nourishment to exhausted and damaged skin. This is a hydrating gel-cream that mildly cares for inner dryness with a natural cooling effect.
*Dermatologically tested*

4.name: CHIA SEED Hydrating Mist
4.description:
Formulated with Chia Seed and Pink Vitamin (Vitamin B12) for intense, upgraded hydrating care compared to original Chia Seed line
Revamped Chia Seed Mist with added Vitamin B12 to deliver instant nourishment to exhausted and damaged skin. This is a mild, soothing watery mist that efficiently cares for irritated skin.
*Dermatologically tested*

5.name: GREEN NATURAL SEED Antioxidant Lotion
5.description:
An antioxidant lotion formulated with the Green Natural Seed Formula™ to soothe dry, irritated, and sensitive without leaving a sticky residue.
*Antioxidant tested*
*Dermatologically tested*

6.name: GREEN NATURAL SEED Antioxidant Serum
6.description:
An antioxidant serum formulated with the Green Natural Seed Formula™ to firm dry, irritated, and sensitive skin with a healthy glow. 
*Antioxidant tested*
*Dermatologically tested*

7.name: ENERGY SEED Antioxidant Hydro Serum
7.description:
An essential water-type serum to replenish moisturizing & antioxidant effects that can be used in the first skincare step.
*Antioxidant tested*
*Dermatologically tested*

8.name: Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Cream Special Set
8.description:
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating line is a revamped line formulated with 12 medicinal herbs, with added white truffles, and deer antlers.
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Cream is ultra-nourishing balm-type cream which improves the skin's texture and its natural resilience to crete a more radiant look. 
Fragrance: Refreshing scent of ginseng leaves and flowers.
Texture: Nutrient-rich texture yet highly adhering and fast absorbing.
This set comes with:

Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Cream 50ml
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Toner 32ml
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Emulsion 32ml
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Serum 10ml

9.name: Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Toner
9.description:
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating line is a revamped line formulated with 12 medicinal herbs, with added white truffles, deer antlers, and fine gold particles.
Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Toner is dual-functional toner with ultra-nourishing "golden" fluid formula that creates a protective moisture barrier, balances PH levels, and evens out skin texture by providing deep moisture to make your complexion radiant. 
Fragrance: Refreshing scent of ginseng leaves and flowers.
Texture: Nutrient-rich texture yet highly adhering and fast absorbing.

10.name: Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Serum
10.description:
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating line is a revamped line formulated with 12 medicinal herbs, with added white truffles, and deer antlers.
Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Serum is an ultra-nourishing serum which applies effortlessly to improve elasticity for a healthy-looking complexion.
Fragrance: Refreshing scent of ginseng leaves and flowers.
Texture: Highly concentrated formula with half-transparent essence formula that delivers a firming and moisturizing sensation.

11.name: Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Emulsion
11.description:
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating line is a revamped line formulated with 12 medicinal herbs, with added white truffles, deer antlers, and fine gold particles.
Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Emulsion improves elasticity of the skin and evens out pigmentation.
Fragrance: Refreshing scent of ginseng leaves and flowers.
Texture: Highly concentrated formula with half-transparent essence formula that delivers a firming and moisturizing sensations.

12.name: Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating Eye Cream
12.description:
Yehwadam Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating line is a revamped line formulated with 12 medicinal herbs, with added white truffles, and deer antlers.
Hwansaenggo Ultimate Rejuvenating eye cream is ultra-nourishing which adheres to the skin to provide instant moisture and to improve elasticity around the delicate eye area.
Fragrance: Refreshing scent of ginseng leaves and flowers.
Texture: Nutrient-rich texture yet highly adhering and fast absorbing.

13.name: YEHWADAM Heaven Grade Ginseng Regenerating Oil Ampoule
13.description:
A premium deep moisturizing anti-aging oil packed with the energy of wild Korean herbs, providing rich nutrients and a radiant glow to dry skin that lack elasticity. 

About Yehwadam Regenerating: Anti-aging skincare line that improves overall skin health from the inside out with the help of traditional Korean herbs, ginseng and flowers. Yehwadam products are made with natural Korean ingredients processed by traditional methods passed down from one generation to another.

14.name: GREEN NATURAL SEED Antioxidant Cream
14.description:
A high-quality antioxidant cream formulated with seed-derived Tocopherol that has mild yet effective EWG Green Grade ingredients.
*Antioxidant tested*
*Dermatologically tested*

15.name: GREEN NATURAL SEED Antioxidant Toner
15.description:
An antioxidant toner which helps to create fully hydrated skin and relieves the stressors due to dry circumstances.
*Antioxidant tested*
*Dermatologically tested*

16.name: DR.BELMEUR Amino Clear Peeling Pad
16.description:
A low-irritant peeling toner formula infused with amino acid helps to remove excess oil, dead skin cells and impurities to create a smoother complexion. The peeling toner and 60 exfoliating pads are meant for daily use (if you have sensitive skin, it is recommended to use the peeling toner 2-3 times a week). The product combines the exfoliating effect with skincare function, as the formula covers the toner step.
Skin type:  All skin types. Suitable for sensitive skin.
Fragrance: refreshing citrus herbal scent of rosemary, bergamot and eucalyptus.  
Pads texture: double-sided pad with gauze side for intense care of dull skin with excess dead skin cells (not suitable for sensitive skin) and embossed side gentle peeling effect.  
Peeling water: transparent, watery texture which is being absorbed by the pads. 
Dermatologically tested.

17.name: JEJU Aloe Fresh Soothing Gel
17.description: Formulated with 99% Aloe Vera Leaf Extract from Jeju island to soothe and moisturize the skin! This gel can be used for various purposes, including moisturizing, soothing, facial pack, and after-sun care. As Aloe Vera Leaf Extract is absored into the skin without leaving any sticky residue behind, it soothes and moisturizes at the same time. Formulated without five additives: parabens, benzophenone, animal-derived ingredients, mineral oil, artifical colouring.

18.name: DR.BELMEUR Daily Repair Rehydrating Mist
18.description: This mist soothes sensitive skin and consistently moisturizes skin in need of hydration. Formulated with the daily low-irritant moisturizing solution Skin-sync Rx™ which its 3 key ingredients help form a moisture layer to calm dry skin : shea butter, moroheiya and birch tree sap.*Formulated without 10 additives (parabens synthetic pigments, phenoxyethanol, mineral oil, benzophenone-3, animal-derived ingredients, propylene glycol, ethanol, talc, benzoic acid) or artificial fragranceAbout Dr.Belmeur Daily Repair: A premium derma-cosmetic skincare line that uses plant-based ingredients that have similar components to our skin. Dermatologically tested, this line provides gentle skincare and barrier-enhancing solution to common skin problems. The Daily Repair offers a custom-made formula that helps improve sensitive skin.

19.name: THE THERAPY Secret-made Anti-Aging Eye Treatment
19.description: This soft moisturizing cream provides one-step care to deliver hydration, firmness and illumination to skin around the eyes. It promotes elasticity and reduces the appearance of wrinkles around the eyes. Formulated with:Oat seed: Has anti-inflammatory effects and gathers moisture to provide deep moisturizationMarigold Flowers: Has anti-oxidant effects, makes skin look soft and fairBay Leaves: Provides calming and purifying effects on sensitive skin + astringent effectsOlives: Rich in unsaturated fatty acids, it calms skin inflammation + natural moisturizer that prevents drynessAbout The Therapy : Anti-aging skincare line that embodies a two-century-old European natural blending method from Le Marche, Italy. The use of oat seeds, marigold, bay leaf and olive extracts keep skin looking youthful.

20.name: YEHWADAM Heaven Grade Ginseng Regenerating Eye Cream
20.description: Nourishing eye cream infused with nutrients that brings firmness and reduces wrinkles around the eye area. Formulated with Korean herbs: Heaven Grade Ginseng from Geumsan (considered the highest class of ginseng, this red ginseng is aged 6 years and has a greater amount of saponin than other ginseng. It promotes growth of new cells to improve resilience and exfoliate dead skin cells) and Natural Pine Mushroom from Gagwon-do (rich in antioxidants, minerals and vitamins, it helps promote skin regeneration).About Yehwadam Regenerating:  Anti-aging skincare line that improves overall skin health from the inside out with the help of traditional Korean herbs, ginseng and flowers. Yehwadam products are made with natural Korean ingredients processed by traditional methods passed down from one generation to another.

21.name: YEHWADAM Revitalizing Eye Cream
21.description: Revitalizes skin around the eyes with a soft texture to minimize the appearance of fine lines and dark circles. Formulated with Korean herbs: Safflower from Sancheong (improves skin tone and promotes blood circulation), Ginseng from Punggi (restore youthful skin, some say ginseng is the secret to younger looking skin) and Goji Berries from Cheongyang (antioxidant that fights fine lines and wrinkles and fortifies natural resilience of skin, for a radiant and glowing skin).About Yehwadam Revitalizing: Early anti-aging skincare line that brings out skin’s innate healthy glow with the help of traditional Korean herbs, ginseng and flowers. Yehwadam products are made with natural Korean ingredients processed by traditional methods passed down from one generation to another.The perfect skincare range that prevents the signs of premature aging, the Revitalizing line makes dull skin radiant again. YEHWADAM contains ingredients obtained from Korea improve skin luminosity.

22.name: WHITE SEED Brightening Toner
22.description:
This translucent, brightening toner helps brighten the skin and clear away dullness without leaving a sticky residue. The compound of brightening ingredients:  White Lupin Seed, which contains a natural brightening substance, and White Daisy Flower extract, which helps reducing dullness, makes the skin look bright and clear. 

Formulated without 7 additives: parabens, tar colorant, animal-sourced ingredients, mineral oil, talc, polyacrylamide, paraffin

About White Seed : Botanical skincare line that moisturizes the skin while improving skin texture and clarity. White seed is formulated with White Lupine Seed which contains natural brightening ingredient to reduce dullness of skin to appear more luminous by controlling melanin formation.

23.description: This smooth, brightening serum effectively penetrates into skin, giving it a boost of radiance and brightness. 24.name: Peat miracle eye cream
24.description: Our belief to support natural skin turnover, treating and nourishing the eye area. This velvety textured eye cream contains mineral-rich peat extract- a rare blend of 80 different herbs deposited over millennia in uncontaminated glacial pools of the Northern European tundras that helps to increase skin elasticity around the eyes, leaving it visibly smooth and plump. Humic acid of peat extract in Peat miracle revital eye cream plumps up the eye area.

Enhanced moisture retention rate

A hydrating and nourishing eye treatment that provides long-lasting moisture and firmness to the delicate eye area.

This ultra-hydrating and firming eye cream provides lasting hydration and elasticity to the delicate eye area without heaviness. It is formulated with natural oils, including cupuacu seed butter and macadamia nut oil, which help to keep the eye area looking youthful, supple and firm.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
Parabens Sulfates Phthalates

45.name: Hungarian water essence
45.description:
Lightweight hydrating serum? Yes!

An instant, lightweight hydration serum that is powerfully effective for deep, lasting hydration.

Hungarian Water Essence recharges skin’s lost hydration back in an instant. This formula contains a blend of apothecary herbs, including rosemary and lavender—powerful hydrating and antioxidant agents. This ultra-light watery texture instantly glides onto skin to provide a burst of powerful moisture that penetrates the skin for long-lasting hydration, leaving the skin healthy-looking, soft, and supple.

Parabens Sulfates Phthalates

A nutrient-dense essence that nourishes and hydrates to improve skin elasticity, tone, and texture.

Classic Essence Increment instantly breathes life into skin by providing essential nutrients and vitamins to a dry, depleted complexion. Clinically tested to provide up to 24 hours of moisture, this highly-nourishing formula restores the skin’s natural moisture barrier to keep skin supple and elastic, restoring an even tone and smooth texture. Formulated with heartsease and catnip, natural hydrating agents, and chickweed, a vitamin-rich apothecary herb, it leaves skin fully invigorated and energized.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
Parabens Sulfates Phthalates

54.description: Regenerating emulsion provides a strong protective film over skin by moisturizing skin from deep within. Formulated with Korean herbs: Heaven Grade Ginseng from Geumsan (considered the highest class of ginseng, this red ginseng is aged 6 years and has a greater amount of saponin than other ginseng. It promotes growth of new cells to improve resilience and exfoliate dead skin cells) and Natural Pine Mushroom from Gagwon-do (rich in antioxidants, minerals and vitamins, it helps promote skin regeneration). Also contains shea butter and macadamia nut oil to help the skin retain moisture.About Yehwadam Regenerating:  Anti-aging skincare line that improves overall skin health from the inside out with the help of traditional Korean herbs, ginseng and flowers. Yehwadam products are made with natural Korean ingredients processed by traditional methods passed down from one generation to another.

55.name: YEHWADAM Revitalizing Emulsion
55.description: Revitalizing emulsion that provides long lasting moisturizing and nourishing protection to the skin's barrier to prevent the signs of premature aging. Formulated with Korean herbs: Safflower from Sancheong (improves skin tone and promotes blood circulation), Ginseng from Punggi (restore youthful skin, some say ginseng is the secret to younger looking skin) and Goji Berries from Cheongyang (antioxidant that fights fine lines and wrinkles and fortifies natural resilience of skin, for a radiant and glowing skin).About Yehwadam Revitalizing: Early anti-aging skincare line that brings out skin’s innate healthy glow with the help of traditional Korean herbs, ginseng and flowers. Yehwadam products are made with natural Korean ingredients processed by traditional methods passed down from one generation to another.

56.name: YEHWADAM Revitalizing Cream
56.description: Replenishes skin with moisture and restores firmness while creating a protective layer to prevent any moisture loss. Formulated with Korean herbs: Safflower from Sancheong (improves skin tone and promotes blood circulation), Ginseng from Punggi (restore youthful skin, some say ginseng is the secret to younger looking skin) and Goji Berries from Cheongyang (antioxidant that fights fine lines and wrinkles and fortifies natural resilience of skin, for a radiant and glowing skin).About Yehwadam Revitalizing: Early anti-aging skincare line that brings out skin’s innate healthy glow with the help of traditional Korean herbs, ginseng and flowers. Yehwadam products are made with natural Korean ingredients processed by traditional methods passed down from one generation to another.

57.name: YEHWADAM Pure Brightening  Emulsion
57.description: The brightening emulsion deeply infused with moisture, brightens skin tone and improves the appearance of dull, pigmented skin. About Yehwadam Brightening: Anti-aging skincare line that brightens skin while providing moisture with the help of traditional Korean herbs, ginseng and flowers. Yehwadam products are made with natural Korean ingredients processed by traditional methods passed down from one generation to another.

58.name: YEHWADAM Pure Brightening Cream
58.description: The brightening cream instantly boosts skin’s radiance and reduces the appearance of age spots and pigmentation.About Yehwadam Brightening: Anti-aging skincare line that brightens skin while providing moisture with the help of traditional Korean herbs, ginseng and flowers. Yehwadam products are made with natural Korean ingredients processed by traditional methods passed down from one generation to another.

59.name: YEHWADAM Revitalizing Moisturizing  Fluid
59.description: Formulated with Fresh Flower Water, a secret formula that consists of 5 types of traditional herbal ingredients including Korean Ginseng, Safflower and Goji berries, the revitalizing moisturizing fluid is a water-based, all-in-one product combing toner and lotion together for easy yet effective and long-lasting moisture.

60.name: YEHWADAM Revitalizing Moisturizing Cream
60.description: Formulated with Fresh Flower Water, a secret formula that consists of 5 types of traditional herbal ingredients including Korean Ginseng, Safflower and Goji berries, this revitalizing moisturizing cream is a  lightweight gel cream that deeply hydrates the skin without leaving a sticky sensation.

61.name: DR.BELMEUR Daily Repair Moisturizer
61.description:
A low-irritant moisturizer that calms sensitive skin and protects skin damaged by the external environment. Formulated with the daily low-irritant moisturizing solution Skin-sync Rx™ which its 3 key ingredients help form a moisture layer to calm dry skin : phytoshpingosine (protects and strengthens skin barrier), moroheiya (retains moisture by restoring moisture in skin’s barrier) and birch tree sap (calms redness & soothes skin).

*Formulated without 9 additives (parabens, synthetic pigments, triethanolamine, mineral oil, benzophenone-3, animal-derived ingredients, propylene glycol, talc, benzoic acid) or artificial fragrance 

About Dr.Belmeur Daily Repair: A premium derma-cosmetic skincare line that uses plant-based ingredients that have similar components to our skin. Dermatologically tested, this line provides gentle skincare and barrier-enhancing solution to common skin problems. The Daily Repair offers a custom-made formula that helps improve sensitive skin.

62.name: DR.BELMEUR Daily Repair Ato Salt Cream
62.description: Mineral salt cream that provides deep moisturization and itch relief for dry & flaky skin, while strenghtening the protective function of the skin. Contains 8% sea salt that soothes itchiness and peony extract, phytosphingosine and ceramide that deeply moisturize the skin. *Formulated without 10 additives (parabens synthetic pigments, phenoxyethanol, mineral oil, benzophenone-3, animal-derived ingredients, propylene glycol, ethanol, talc, benzoic acid) or artificial fragranceAbout Dr.Belmeur Daily Repair: A premium derma-cosmetic skincare line that uses plant-based ingredients that have similar components to our skin. Dermatologically tested, this line provides gentle skincare and barrier-enhancing solution to common skin problems. The Daily Repair offers a custom-made formula that helps improve sensitive skin.

63.name: DR.BELMEUR Clarifying Moisturizer
63.description: This low-irritant clarifying moisturizer takes care of excess oil and maintains skin's oil and moisture balance. Custom-made formula Skin-sync Rx™ composed of betaglucan (maintains optimal moisture balance), chaga mushroom extract (soothes and calms skin), blue citrus peel extract (controls excess sebum).*Formulated without 8 additives (parabens, synthetic pigments, mineral oil, benzophenone-3, animal-derived ingredients, propylene glycol, talc, benzoic acid) or artificial fragranceAbout Dr.Belmeur Daily Repair: A premium derma-cosmetic skincare line that uses plant-based ingredients that have similar components to our skin. Dermatologically tested, this line provides gentle skincare and barrier-enhancing solution to common skin problems. The Clarifying collection offers a custom-made formula that helps improve oily and acne-prone skin.

64.name: DR.BELMEUR ADVANCED CICA Recovery Cream
64.description: Recovery cream that provides intense care by creating a barrier similar to the skins to moisturize and improve damaged skin. Custom-made formula Skin-sync Rx™, containing ceramide, panthenol, centella asiatica extract and 3 other effective ingredients that improves the skin barrier to strengthen the skin’s own energy.Formulated without 9 additives (synthetic pigments, artificial fragrance, phenoxyethanol, triethanolamine, mineral oil, benzophenone-3, ethanol, talc, benzoic acid)100% natural fragrance- soft citrus floral scentAbout Dr.Belmeur CICA Recovery: A premium derma-cosmetic skincare line that uses plant-based ingredients that have similar components to our skin. Dermatologically tested, this line provides gentle skincare and barrier-enhancing solution to common skin problems. The Advanced CICA Recovery collection offers a custom-made formula that helps improve damaged skin.

65.name: Peat miracle cream
65.description: Our belief to support natural skin turnover, helping to turnaround dull, tired skin to reveal a youthful smooth complexion. This nourishing moisturizer deeply hydrates and treats dry, dull, and depleted skin.Peat miracle revital cream contains peat extract and improves your turnover rate by 9.28%, rejuvenating and hydrating your skin.

66.name: The True Cream Moisturizing Bomb
66.description: A comforting moisturizing cream for normal to dry skin types that provides the skin with intense hydration, leaving it supple, smooth, and deeply nourished.

67.name: The True Cream Aqua Bomb
67.description: A gel-cream that 'floods' the skin with a rush of refreshing hydration and minimizes the appearance of pores for soft, smooth, supple skin. Perfect for normal to combination skin types, including oily and dry skin looking for a lightweight moisturizer.

68.name: Creamy moisturizer deep moist
68.description:
We’ve got agents for dry skin conditions!A creamy, indulgent moisturizer that provides long-lasting, dewy hydration.This rich yet lightweight moisturizer deeply hydrates and nourishes dry, depleted skin. This formula is a unique blend of time-tested apothecary herbs, including powerful, nourishing witch hazel and molokhia extracts, rich in antioxidant polyphenols and minerals, which help to prevent dryness and leave the skin naturally luminous. More than a moisturizer, it smooths texture and helps to neutralize skin-damaging free radicals.What it is formulated WITHOUT:

    Parabens
    Sulfates
    Phthalates

What else you need to know:This dermatologist tested product is free of mineral oil, petrolatum, synthetic preservatives, dyes, and fragrances, and animal origin ingredients.

69.name: Milky moisturizer hydra balancing
69.description: A lightweight, milky moisturizer formulated with sage extract that leaves skin hydrated, balanced, and soothed.

70.name: Oil control moisturizer fresh
70.description:
For oily skin? Yes!An oil-free moisturizer that controls oil, refines pores, and leaves skin hydrated and smooth.This formula is a unique blend of time-tested apothecary herbs, including rosehip, a powerful vitamin-C packed ingredient. The fresh, lightweight texture controls oil and refines pores while providing hydration for a smooth, supple, and fresh feel.What it is formulated WITHOUT:

Parabens
Sulfates
Phthalates

What else you need to know:This dermatologist tested product is free of mineral oil, petrolatum, synthetic preservatives, dyes, fragrances, and animal origin ingredients.

71.name: Creamy cleansing foam moist
71.description: A vitamin-C packed creamy foam cleanser with natural herbs that gently yet effectively remove makeup and impurities while hydrating the skin.
